verses.verse: וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after זָקֵ֖ן <S%H2204><s%> was old שְׁמוּאֵ֑ל <S%H8050><s%> And it came to pass when Samuel וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> that he made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֛יו <S%H1121><s%> his sons שֹׁפְטִ֖ים <S%H8199><s%> judges לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> over Israel

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> become שֶׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> Now the name בְּנ֤וֹ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted הַבְּכוֹר֙ <S%H1060><s%> of his firstborn יוֹאֵ֔ל <S%H3100><s%> was Joel וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> and the name מִשְׁנֵ֖הוּ <S%H4932><s%> of his second אֲבִיָּ֑ה <S%H29><s%> Abiah שֹׁפְטִ֖ים <S%H8199><s%> [they were] judges בִּבְאֵ֥ר שָֽׁבַע׃ <S%H884><s%> in Beersheba

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הָלְכ֤וּ <S%H1980><s%> walked בָנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> And his sons [בְּדַרְכֹו כ] (בִּדְרָכָ֔יו <S%H1870><s%> along ק) וַיִּטּ֖וּ <S%H5186><s%> but turned aside אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after הַבָּ֑צַע <S%H1215><s%> lucre וַיִּ֨קְחוּ־ <S%H3947><s%> and took שֹׁ֔חַד <S%H7810><s%> bribes וַיַּטּ֖וּ <S%H5186><s%> and perverted מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> judgment פ

וַיִּֽתְקַבְּצ֔וּ <S%H6908><s%> gathered themselves together כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> Then all the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> to Samuel הָרָמָֽתָה׃ <S%H7414><s%> unto Ramah

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> And said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> Behold אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you זָקַ֔נְתָּ <S%H2204><s%> unto him Behold thou art old וּבָנֶ֕יךָ <S%H1121><s%> and thy sons לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not הָלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> walk בִּדְרָכֶ֑יךָ <S%H1870><s%> not in thy ways עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now שִֽׂימָה־ <S%H7760><s%> now make לָּ֥נוּ מֶ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> us a king לְשָׁפְטֵ֖נוּ <S%H8199><s%> to judge כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> us like all the nations

וַיֵּ֤רַע <S%H7489><s%> was displeasing הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> But the thing בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> the sight שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> Samuel כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> they אָמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> when they said תְּנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> Give לָּ֥נוּ מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> us a king לְשָׁפְטֵ֑נוּ <S%H8199><s%> to judge וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֥ל <S%H6419><s%> prayed שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> us And Samuel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> unto Samuel שְׁמַע֙ <S%H8085><s%> Hearken בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> unto the voice הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people לְכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> they יֹאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> in all that they say אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> about כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not אֹֽתְךָ֙ <S%H853><s%> מָאָ֔סוּ <S%H3988><s%> unto thee for they have not rejected כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֹתִ֥י <S%H853><s%> מָאֲס֖וּ <S%H3988><s%> thee but they have rejected מִמְּלֹ֥ךְ <S%H4427><s%> me that I should not reign עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> over

כְּכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמַּעֲשִׂ֣ים <S%H4639><s%> According to all the works אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשׂ֗וּ <S%H6213><s%> which they have done מִיּוֹם֩ <S%H3117><s%> since the day הַעֲלֹתִ֨י <S%H5927><s%> that I brought them up אֹתָ֤ם <S%H853><s%> מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> even unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> to this וַיַּ֣עַזְבֻ֔נִי <S%H5800><s%> wherewith they have forsaken וַיַּעַבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> me and served אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <S%H312><s%> other כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> after that הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they עֹשִׂ֖ים <S%H6213><s%> so do גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also לָֽךְ׃

וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> Now שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> Now therefore hearken בְּקוֹלָ֑ם <S%H6963><s%> unto their voice אַ֗ךְ <S%H389><s%> howbeit כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָעֵ֤ד <S%H5749><s%> yet protest תָּעִיד֙ <S%H5749><s%> solemnly בָּהֶ֔ם וְהִגַּדְתָּ֣ <S%H5046><s%> unto them and shew לָהֶ֔ם מִשְׁפַּ֣ט <S%H4941><s%> them the manner הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יִמְלֹ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> that shall reign עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> over ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> told שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> all the words יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֕ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people הַשֹּׁאֲלִ֥ים <S%H7592><s%> that asked מֵאִתּ֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> of him a king ס

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said זֶ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> This יִֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become מִשְׁפַּ֣ט <S%H4941><s%> This will be the manner הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יִמְלֹ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> that shall reign עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H1121><s%> your sons יִקָּ֗ח <S%H3947><s%> over you He will take וְשָׂ֥ם <S%H7760><s%> and appoint לוֹ֙ בְּמֶרְכַּבְתּ֣וֹ <S%H4818><s%> [them] for himself for his chariots וּבְפָרָשָׁ֔יו <S%H6571><s%> and [to be] his horsemen וְרָצ֖וּ <S%H7323><s%> and [some] shall run לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before מֶרְכַּבְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H4818><s%> his chariots

וְלָשׂ֣וּם <S%H7760><s%> And he will appoint ל֔וֹ שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> him captains אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> over thousands וְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> and captains חֲמִשִּׁ֑ים <S%H2572><s%> over fifties וְלַחֲרֹ֤שׁ <S%H2790><s%> and [will set them] to ear חֲרִישׁוֹ֙ <S%H2758><s%> his ground וְלִקְצֹ֣ר <S%H7114><s%> and to reap קְצִיר֔וֹ <S%H7105><s%> his harvest וְלַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> and to make כְּלֵֽי־ <S%H3627><s%> his instruments מִלְחַמְתּ֖וֹ <S%H4421><s%> of war וּכְלֵ֥י <S%H3627><s%> and instruments רִכְבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H7393><s%> of his chariots

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1323><s%> your daughters יִקָּ֑ח <S%H3947><s%> And he will take לְרַקָּח֥וֹת <S%H7548><s%> [to be] confectionaries וּלְטַבָּח֖וֹת <S%H2879><s%> and [to be] cooks וּלְאֹפֽוֹת׃ <S%H644><s%> and [to be] bakers

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׂ֠דֽוֹתֵיכֶם <S%H7704><s%> your fields וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּרְמֵיכֶ֧ם <S%H3754><s%> and your vineyards וְזֵיתֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H2132><s%> and your oliveyards הַטּוֹבִ֖ים <S%H2896><s%> [even] the best יִקָּ֑ח <S%H3947><s%> And he will take וְנָתַ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> [of them] and give לַעֲבָדָֽיו׃ <S%H5650><s%> [them] to his servants

וְזַרְעֵיכֶ֥ם <S%H2233><s%> of your seed וְכַרְמֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H3754><s%> and of your vineyards יַעְשֹׂ֑ר <S%H6237><s%> And he will take the tenth וְנָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and give לְסָרִיסָ֖יו <S%H5631><s%> to his officers וְלַעֲבָדָֽיו׃ <S%H5650><s%> and to his servants

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַבְדֵיכֶם֩ <S%H5650><s%> your menservants וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׁפְח֨וֹתֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H8198><s%> and your maidservants וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּחוּרֵיכֶ֧ם <S%H970><s%> young men הַטּוֹבִ֛ים <S%H2896><s%> and your goodliest וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲמוֹרֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H2543><s%> and your asses יִקָּ֑ח <S%H3947><s%> And he will take וְעָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> and put לִמְלַאכְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H4399><s%> [them] to his work

צֹאנְכֶ֖ם <S%H6629><s%> of your sheep יַעְשֹׂ֑ר <S%H6237><s%> He will take the tenth וְאַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you תִּֽהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> will become ל֥וֹ לַעֲבָדִֽים׃ <S%H5650><s%> and ye shall be his servants

וּזְעַקְתֶּם֙ <S%H2199><s%> And ye shall cry out בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> because מַלְכְּכֶ֔ם <S%H4428><s%> of your king אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom בְּחַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H977><s%> which ye shall have chosen לָכֶ֑ם וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יַעֲנֶ֧ה <S%H6030><s%> will not hear יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> you and the LORD אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> you in that day הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַיְמָאֲנ֣וּ <S%H3985><s%> refused הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> Nevertheless the people לִשְׁמֹ֖עַ <S%H8085><s%> to obey בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice שְׁמוּאֵ֑ל <S%H8050><s%> of Samuel וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> and they said לֹּ֔א <S%H3808><s%> No כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Nay but we will have a king יִֽהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> over

וְהָיִ֥ינוּ <S%H1961><s%> become גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> That we also may be like all the nations וּשְׁפָטָ֤נוּ <S%H8199><s%> may judge מַלְכֵּ֙נוּ֙ <S%H4428><s%> and that our king וְיָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> us and go out לְפָנֵ֔ינוּ <S%H6440><s%> before וְנִלְחַ֖ם <S%H3898><s%> us and fight אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִלְחֲמֹתֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H4421><s%> our battles

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> heard שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> all the words הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וַֽיְדַבְּרֵ֖ם <S%H1696><s%> and he rehearsed בְּאָזְנֵ֥י <S%H241><s%> them in the ears יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> to Samuel שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> Hearken בְּקוֹלָ֔ם <S%H6963><s%> unto their voice וְהִמְלַכְתָּ֥ <S%H4427><s%> and make לָהֶ֖ם מֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> them a king וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> ye every man יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> Go אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every לְעִירֽוֹ׃ <S%H5892><s%> unto his city פ
